__e: I can't sell them, they're only sucklings.
Mrs. Griffin, I'm afraid all the toxic chemicals your husband ingested from his homemade energy drink have caused total kidney failure.
I'm just thinking of my father's pigs back home.
I mean, pigs, I had some pigs... and a dog once,
I stayed and kept pigs and now you insult me.
He heard me say she made dirty movies and he storms out of the house.
